title: Great app please use it always
Not good
comment: Only records a few seconds at a time
I'm sorry it didn't work on your phone. Can you send me a recording that failed so that I may investigate, please ? hr@herverenault.fr

title: Thank you, fast and easy to use.
comment: Fast, easy, no messy menu. Just records your note when you open it, saves your recording when you touch the screen, great! When you go to playback you have option to send the recording via email, evernote etc . Ideal for "Note to Self" Thanks again... now I'm off to uninstall the other recorders I downloaded looking for one like this.

title: Xperia x10
comment: Excellent. Very clear sound. Would it be possible to add ability to rename the recordings?
Don't spend money on dictaphone. Just download this app. Excellent.
